coloredTexts.text: I would really like to obtain a Bone Serpent Tooth to be able to see under the lava, but I have to be careful to not burn myself.
Pufferfish are very useful to create Potions that allow to breathe through water temporarily.
I hope one day to work alongside Noah. So mysterious, so magical.
This potions are too strong for you traveler, they will kill you.
While they look pretty, the potions taste terrible.
Dragon breath? This recipe must be wrong. Where do I get that?
How is drinking or throwing a potion supposed to have the same effect?
